text: Hypochlorite is an ion. It can be found in household bleach, sodium hypochlorite. It is unstable, meaning that it breaks down easily. Hypochlorites react with acids to produce chlorine. Their chemical formula is . It is a strong oxidizing agent. It contains chlorine in its +1 oxidation state. They are the salts of hypochlorous acid. ==Related pages== *Chlorate *Sodium hypochlorite *Potassium chlorate Category:Chlorine compounds Category:Oxyanions
title: Hypochlorite
